values:
Hey hey, been really stressed and busy with school. So haven't been able to update this as much as I would like. I have a shoot tonight, so I am pretty stoked about it. Hopefully it comes out good, if not, i`ll be hella pissed. My pics from my shoot with John Gleim came out good, so you can check them out on myspace.com/___nickyxo

Other than my shoot, nothing else is new. Except me and brit decided to get a tanning package at this awesome salon near school. Its so nice in there, and I can't wait to be really tan again lol.

Hey, haven't updated this thing in quite some time, but I decided to on account I don't leave for class for another 20-25 minutes and I'm bored sitting around my room. 
So I moved into school and am a week in. I love my roommates and my new apartment. I dont know how much I love having 3 psych classes this semester, but eh we'll see. Campus is beautiful, and I can't wait until the first home football game, which is not this weekend, but the next. And then the following is homecoming, I think. For the first time, in ever.. I will have school spirit. I've changed high schools so many times, I never really had any school spirit for one particular school. But now I can.

I guess, I better go. I should be studying for my psychology quiz today. O well. I can do that after class.

- Nicole

Hey readers. Not sure who acually reads this, but anywho... Things are starting to come together. After a summer of stress, not much excitement, and work, I finally paid my apt. and I got my roomates. I'm so excited. On my own, isn't going to be easy, but I definately can't wait for the long awaited "college life". After a year at community, I can't wait to finally move on. I can't say that community was horrible. I made a good friend Nicole, who I know I can call whenever life throws me down a bad path, or just when I need someone to talk to. She's amazing. Hmm, but yeah. I'm super excited and finally I can look forward to something. other than that, nothing is new. Tomorrow's my dads birthday, So while hes out getting Tara's school records, I'm running over to Walmart and buying him something and a cake and balloons. Yah.

Considering I haven't done a real update in quite sometime now, I figured, hell why not. I've been so stressed with loans and stuff for school. And now that my grandmom can't find her 2006 tax information, my 16000 loan can't be processed. so now I'm stuck back at square one. I don't know how exactly I will be paying for my 600 dollar rent each month. Hopefully a good job opens up and I can get it. As of right now, I am ttrying to save every single penny. Starting with my next paycheck. I don't get alot each week because they have been giving me less and less hours. That job has its ups and downs sometimes, I swear. 

Hm, ok Im not about to sit here on my day off stressing about school right now. Even though I really should be. But anyhow, on a better note.. I bought this book called The Lovely Bones. It is AMAZING. I recommend it to all. I just got it like a week ago, and I am almost done it. Haha, it gives me something to do when I am sitting on Septa for 90 percent of my day. ;]  I feel like all I have been doing lately, is going to work, or sitting in worrying about school. DAYM there I go again, talking about school. AHH its taking over my life I swear. And I still need to pick up another class. Hm, maybe I`ll do that once Im done updating this jawnskie. 

OOh, really AMAZING song. On my myspace- Appologize by OneRepublic and Timberland. Ah go listen to it now. Im in love with it. And I also looked up the video on youtube, and its so simple but it really hits ya hard. Its a pretty awesome song and video for sure. FOR SUREEEE. Another awesome song is by a girl names Jessie Daniels "What I hear". So also check that biddy up on myspace. Cause she has a kickass voice!\

I've seriously realized how much this summer is so uneventful. I feel like its the same shit everyday these days. I wish things were random, silly, crazy... SOMETHING. Common people. I've been out of school since early May. I move into westchester on August 25th. So my last day at Ritas is August 23. I just wish I could say I accomplished something this summer. I mean I did get close with people from work, MECCA GURL, & DEANNA. They pretty much rock. And I mean I did grow up quite a bit this summer. I became somewhat responsible and I am proud of myself for that. If you know me, I am the one whos always stressed out, but I'll go thru my day with a smile plastered on my face. 

The other night, I realized that its becomming harder and harder to not think of my mom. So the other day I looked online and found that people can cope better when they just write down whatever that comes to mind. I decided that maybe it will help. So I am going to just write everything I felt that last month. From being scared to come home to a house full of grief, tears and calmness trapped within the walls, afraid to talk to her worried that she would stop breathing at any second, seeing her cancer sticken skeletal body succumbed to that fucking uncurable fucking disease that took over in a month, saying goodnight for the last time, telling her I loved her and singing the song that she wrote for me and used to sing to me when I was little("Cause you're mommy's little angel, you're mommys little girl, you're daddys girlfriend") and sitting outfront at 3am praying to God to make everything better and then cursing God the next night at the same time for taking a part of me away. You would think that, yeah I have people who care about me in my life, I should be happy I have a father. But loosing your mom is probably one of the worst things that can happen to you. I am glad that I was not younger and had to go through that. I guess I can accept it, but some days are harder than others.

This is for:

for the girls who post away messages in hopes he'll understand the subliminal messages
for the girls who get bullied in school over things they can't change
for the girls who get dressed 20x before leaving the house
for the girls who are getting played by their boyfriends
for the girls who havent been honored yet, and deserve it
for the girls who write in their journals at 4am
for the girls who go back and read their journals and cry
for the girls who believe every lie
for the girls who live day by day to the fullest
for the girls who write love letters and rip them up
for the girls who live for lyrics that relate to them
for the girls who hate goodbyes
for the girls who are too shy to say hello\
for the girls who save every email, text and letter he ever wrote her

every tear you ever wasted on people who never care
every tear you wanted him to wipe away, and he never did
every hug you never wanted to let go of
every talk you ever wanted to never end
every last word 
every laugh you faked
every smile you forced
every text message he ever sent you saying i love you

the phone calls you make to him telling him your nightmare
the random car rides with your friends blasting music
the nights when life couldn't have been much better
the nights when your lieing on the bathroom floor crying
the nights when  your heads in a toilet and you wish you hadn't drank that much
being so in love it scares you
being so in love you never want to get out
making blogs about anything, nothing and all of the above

wishing someone understood
wishing anyone could relate
wishing you had someone to talk to
wishing you could see them again
wishing life never ended

this is .. for you.
So yet again things are fucking pissing me off again. I swear its something new everyday.

I feel so excited to go to West Chester. Im anxious, but im also nervous. I feel like ever since my mom died, everything has fell apart. It sounds stupid, but its true. My moms bf, Sonny who had lived with us for about 5 years went back to Kentucky, my dog got given away to the spca, and my sister is never home. I just want to get away from it all. I live here with my grandmom. My dad has his own apt. Idk, i just feel like everything is broken.

Break.com emailed me and told me I got "girloftheday". I get paid 50 bucks, and I just gotta fax them the release form and stuff. stoked, for sure.

Mike is in Ocean City, Maryland. I miss him already. Its weird. I usually don't see him fora week anyhow, but knowing that hes so far away is what makes me miss him. =[  He`ll be home on saturday though. so thats good.

Have you ever just wanted to replay one moment of your life over and over again? And never let go of the memory? There are times when I wish we could just drive on forever. There would be no goodbye, I`ll see you next week. There would be no kiss goodbye. Have you ever wished that time would stop for one moment so you can look around and notice all the amazing things in your life, and never let anything slip past you. Today I had a random thought. What if the weeks went on and on, but the calandar days were slower. Like a week equaled day 1. I realized that its not the material items in your life, its the time that you spend with people you love. No matter what it takes to see eachother, you're going to do whatever it takes. No matter how much you fight, whenever you're together, nothing seems more perfect. Nothing is wrong and the best thing in life is that which you hold tight. 

Tip of the day: Never let go of the things you care about most. Cherish every single moment. Don't let anything pass you by.

So today wasnt as bad as i thought it was going to be at work. Went to workat 10am. Stopped at cvs before hand picked up the new Glamour and got some flu medz. YES I HAVE THE FLU. I`m so pissed haha.
Im so congesteddddd.

Tomorrow I`m taking the bus up to KOP to meet up with Michael. Then staying at his house until Sunday morning. I have work Sunday from 4-10. Not too bad. But if im sick it`ll feel like forever.

Mikes going down the shore this week. I plan on doing something too, but idk just what yet. HMM. Im off monday and tuesday. But i guess I should rest, but idk who knows.

So work today wasnt too bad at all. Only thre from 4:45- 9:20. we closed early cause of the crappy weather. 

Other than that, uhm.. just looking for a good graphic designer to design some banners and graphics for me.

Mike made me an extended network banner on myspace. myspace.com/___nickyxo
check it out and comment me and tell me whatcha think, its pretty badass.

So fourth of july sucked. I didnt get to see any fire works, i had work, and its storming. Lovely !!

Not much of an update, probably because i'm too lazy to write anything else, nothing honestly is new, sorry.

Visit me on myspace.

- I miss you.
- Do you?
- Yea.
- [nothing]

In a perfect world that nothing would be replaced with I miss you too.

Anyhow... Work today from 3-10. Haha but me and ange decided to go to Center City last night. Haha in hopes of drinking at a bar that doesnt card. So we get in, then get kicked out, without even drinking haha. Then we walk around Drexel and UPenn. Looking for something to do, and the highlight of the night was going into wawa and asking some guy where spring garden was hahahaha. Then walking up the street with him as he walked his bike to whereever he was going. So random, yes. Then on the EL down to center city, theres this chick who said she just got her bf to write her a 1000 check so she could get out of jail and he wouldnt even pick her up, thats why she was on the EL. lol. soo funny. Then on the way back we're sitting in front of these 2 black kids and they were talking about how they dont understand why people want to have sex with "spagetti meat" [aka skinny chicks] haha me and ange were dieeeing. But yeah any how. Now its about 12:30pm and I have work at 3. 3-10. BOO.

Oh, to make it even awesome-er, i have work on the 4th of july. So that means no fireworks with the bf for me :(
and the only thing i`ll be watching is from the window of ritas water ice. boo. i`m really not happy about this. its not like ritas is gonna be crowded at all since everyones gonna be at the fireworks. ugh im so pissed.

i want a miracle.
i want a wish.
i want the unexpected.
i want a surprise.
i want you.

things are falling apart,
just like i said before.
every aspect of my life is at the moment falling apart.
thank you for caring so much.

So  Alex's party was fun. I looked adorable lol ;] I wore my hot pink mini dress my new heels and my new black hair lol and I was tan, which was good. I didnt even drink that much. I did a beer bong, a bottle, and i think maybe like 2-3 cups. im not realy possitive haha. Ended up not leaving Alex's until about 5. Then me and kev went to Dennys haha. Then I came home and crashed. Ended up sleeping until 1. then waking up, and falling back to sleep until around 4. felt goooood. So now idk what the hell i am doing tonight. on account of my boyfriend doesnt want to come to philly and wants me to take the bus up to kop. uhh i dont really feel like doing that. ugh. but idk if he even is gonna pick me up there now, cuz NOW he may have plans. haha, great i know. and im the little bitch who just follows whatever he says. Its fucked up i know. Ugh any how. so yeah, my plan today was to hang out wit him, and now i guess im not. and he wants to hang out on tuesday on his time. aha fuckkk that. 
I wish i was back in cali, no worries, no stress, just chillen with my girl maddy. goood times.
any howwww: so i got pics to use on my camera, then i`ll get them developed and then put them up on here and myspace.com/___nickyxo   haha i use the disposable cams haha.

blahhh, so idk what the hell is going on for tonight i`ll prolly end up staying in. greaaat the day i fucking give up every week to hang out with mike and now look what the fuck is goin on. im so fucking aggravated.

+ so i dyed my hair black again. i dyed it back around xmas time but it washed out or something lol idk it didnt really work last time i tried but this time i think it looks amazing. cause now im tan and stuff.
+ today i woke up around 12 didnt have work, so i was already in a good mood. then i went dwn south philly and went tanning, i didnt really feel like goin to the gym so i just skipped it. went tanning, called mecca, met up with her and went and got our nails done and chilled at starbucks and chatted.
+ tonight i was supposed to work for hotgirlsofphilly at club 2-7 but i didnt really feel like it on my day off. so i decided not to.

have you ever felt like everything is falling apart? and everyone you love is becomming distant? have you ever felt like nothing was ever good enough? the one you love the most is more and more unhappy?

i hate feeling like im the cause of him being unhappy. he might not say it, but i can tell. if i keep this up, im going to wind up pushing him farther and farther away. and thats the last thing i ever want to do.

 

anyhow... yeah, so idk what im gonna do tonight, maybe hang out with ange. we'll have to c. theres not much to do, but we'll prolly end up driving around. im off from work again tomorrow, thank the lord ;)

I've been working to develop my "super body". My superbody, as totally lame as that sounds, is my happiness inside and out. The way I see myself isn't always positive. Sometimes, like everyone else, I hit rock bottom and feel crappy about how I look and feel. So I have been hitting the gym everyday, tanning, with hopes of building my superbody. I want to feel good all the time and not worry about being out of shape. I am determined to get in better shape, be tan, and have more  self confidence all around. 

So yeah, anyhow.. last night me ange and cait went to some random ass kids house for a party. It was actually iight. Ended up playing beer pong, and having a blast. Ange didnt drink cuz she drove, but me and cait drank way more beer than I think I wanted to lol. I woke up this morning feeling like complete crap but i somehow managed to get my ass up and take a shower, go tanning , go to the gym and now im home chillen before working 3-10. yeah, not too excited to be around water ice and custard all day. 

But tomorrow I am working 10am-6 (UGhhh) but then me and alexis are goin to the lagoon to model for hotgirlsofphilly.com. So i will be working all day tomorrow. at least im getting paid. so whatever. i neeeeed money. then i can finally buy a car. if i buy a car by the end of the summer i will be really excited, but more surprised. so yeah.
if you guys wanna have fun tomorrow, go to the Lagoon in Essington. its gonna be off the hook... did i just say off the hook? haha. niiiiiice.

So today at the gym as I`m doing my arrebesque stretches on the barre, this older guy who is doing situps on the floor across from me asks me, "Are you a ballerina?" And of course I smiled proudly and said, "Yea, I am", Who the hell am I kidding? I guess I even made my self believe that I am. Ballerinas do not take a class here and there, they take numerous classes a day! Ballerina's arent 5 foot 4 weighing 110 pounds. Ballerinas look graceful all the time, I am anything BUT graceful. Ballerinas have a presence about them. They have good posture, good turnout and good feet. I have none of those. Ballerinas are on Pointe. I took half a year and decided I would quit, so I do not know how to dance on pointe, well not trained anyhow. Yeah right... some ballerina.

Oh by the way, I was watching Center Stage last night, and I couldnt help but cry. Yeah I'm too emotional over the stupid things. But whatever.

Hm, why on my day off do I feel like i never get any thing accomplished?
went to the gym for like 30 min this morning, got my nails done, came home and ate my house.
haha.

Its so hot out. I want it to rain. 
Talking to the boyfriend on the phone right now. Nothing too exciting.
My nails are pink again. Love it.
Talking to my grrrl Mecca from work online. Shes so cool. We have so much in common. Its nuts.

Ugh that reminds mee, i have work tomrrow 3-close.
YAY. haha, sike. Well I`m gonn wake up early and go to the gym, cum home and then take a shower and go to Ritas all day and night. EH. well hopefully cool kids are working and i`ll be good.

BLAHBLAHBLAH i hate days off when I get nothing done and i eat my house. ;)

tara comes home tonight.

RITAS: 
Okay, so rita's is pretty fun. i mean i love working with a bunch of awesome chill kids. my first paycheck was only around 75 dollars because I only worked a few days my first week, but now that i`m working 8 hours a day and 4-5 days a week, its definately going to be alot more money, thank god.
BALLYS:
So i got my fat ass up and decided to get a gym membership. it was 60 dollars down, which i paid. then 50 a month, and my dad said he`ll pay 30 of it each month. i have a 3 year contract with them. i love it. i love just going and feeling great afterwards, i try toget my ass down there everymorning before work and run at least a mile on the treadmill. oo and they also have the best juice bar ever. 
WEEKEND:
So my weekend was decent. Friday I went to the gym in the morninq then i went up to kop and ran into eric and blow at the mall, walked around with them and waited for mike to pick me up. then ben and sammy came over and we hung out. then mikes mom had people over for happy hour. saturday, pretty much sat around mikes again all day and we ended up going to get his new car and then went to chilis and then walked around center city at night, which was cute. then slept at mikes again then went to work today 3-11.
MODELING:
Modeling hasn't been too exciting lately, I am on q102's Joey Brooks site for their bikini girls pics in order to win kelly clarkson tixx. I have a shoot this Saturday with my qirlie alexis in philly. should be a pretty awesome shoot, theres gonna be a makeup artist and hair stylist there ;]    other than that, i dont really have any big projects coming up, I am going to shoot with Philly Fit pretty soon, as soon as I get a day off from work. I had to keep rescheduling the shoot. I also have to get a day to go up to WMMR because they want me to be a Preston And Steve GIRL! I`m so excited about that. So sometime either this month or next, i`m gonna go up and shoot.

munchkiin   xoo: like at my moms funeral, i cried, but nothing like i do when im by myself at night,.
munchkiin   xoo: i dont think the pains ever going to go away.
munchkiin   xoo: i put on this front and people think im alright. but no one knows  the pain im in every fucking day of my life.
munchkiin   xoo: i know. she`d want me to be strong. its just really hard, yanno. i feel like i coulda done more, i coulda done something. i dont even know what. its just so unreal, its weird. its like i dont wanna believe it. 
munchkiin   xoo: i've always been involved with like my religion (roman catholic) like i went to catholic school and stuff. and when my mom was dying i remember sitting outside the night before she died just crying and praying to God she'd be alright. and then the night she died i sat outside again just yelling at God for taking her away.

=================================================================================
I`m tired of feeling like this. I'm tired of crying at night. I'm tired of the breakdown. I'm tired of pretending to be okay. I don't like when people feel bad for me. I don't like feeling bad for myself. I know I can be that strong person I know I am.

Evanescence- "My Immortal"
I'm so tired of being here
Suppressed by all my childish fears
And if you have to leave
I wish that you would just leave
'Cause your presence still lingers here
And it won't leave me alone

These wounds won't seem to heal
This pain is just too real
There's just too much that time cannot erase

When you cried I'd wipe away all of your tears
When you'd scream I'd fight away all of your fears
And I held your hand through all of these years
But you still have
All of me 

You used to captivate me
By your resonating life
Now I'm bound by the life you've left behind
Your face it haunts
My once pleasant dreams
Your voice it chased away
All the sanity in me

I've tried so hard to tell myself that you're gone
But though you're still with me
I've been alone all along

I dont understand things sometimes. Why when I do things, he tells me its kinda gross. But there are 35743434 girls out there who do the same thing, and he idolizes them. FUCKKKKING WHAT? i dont understand. am i missin something?

vote for me for XS MAGAZINE's model of the month contest. if i win i get to be in their calendar and i get 1000 bucks. i would reallly be able to get a car then. so please if you can, just vote for me . its really fast and easy. and i would LOVE if you could post a bullitan on myspace advising everyone u know to vote also.

is it ever going to be okay?
is there ever going to be a day i dont remember that shes gone?
each day that passes, i feel like i'm in this alone. 
i keep thinking shes on a long vacation and she's going to walk through the door.
why is it always when i need her the most that she's not here?
why couldn't we just be best friends?

i hate this shaking, crying my eyes out till i can't breathe, feeling like I am going to pass out feeling.
she was always there to tell me everything would be okay, and talk some sense into me.
she was always there to rub my back when I was upset giving me every reason why life would be that much better.
she was always there, even when we fought, to tell me that she only bitched because she didn't want me to make bad decisions.

mom, i miss you.

Hey. So I officially have the flu, or some form of head cold. Yesss it sucks majorly i know. Anyhow, this weekend is memorial day weekend [i believe] and something fun better be going down. But, anyhow.. last night I was on the phone with Mike until 2 am, just chatten. Then I decided to read a little of the book I am reading, "Pretend you dont see her" by Mary Higgens Clark. I ended up staying up until about 4 finishing it. I couldn't put it down. Chyea. So now I am living off of about 3 hours of sleep at the most. I have work today @ fridays from noon-5. At least its not all day, thank god. Anthony from Rita's Water Ice is going to ask my old boss if they would hire me back for the summer. So if I get that job, I will work at rita's monday-thursday, work at tgifridays on friday, and once abercrombie opens back up work there on the weekends. psh thats alot of working,.but i neeeeed a car for school in the fall. if i want to have a job while i`m going to school at west chester, i am going to have to have a car. 

Ah, so I broke tara's camera last night, so I have to buy her a new one. Thankfully I got money from the funeral, and I have enough to pay her. Ugh I was so pissed. Ended up accidentally dropping it in my basement. Because I was taking pics of her and her friend Brittany.

Okay, I guess alot has happened over the past month. I've finished my first year at college, I got acept to West Chester for the fall semester, my mom died, lived with my uncle for a few weeks, now I live back at home.

Its really hard, though, to call a place "home" on account of I always feel like I am any place but home. When I am not here they bitch and when I am here they bitch. Its an ongoing cycle.Whatever. 

I have an appointment to make a schedule @ west chester on June 4th. My aunt donna is taking me. I am pretty darn excited to finally be going off to college. It is amazing and exciting and a total escape from this hell I am in now ;]

Anyyyyhow, instead of me rambling for another random entry. Here are my goals for today::
1. work out for at least an hour
2. sit outside and tan for at least an hour
3. call dad about cell phone

not very cool goals i know, but hey we all gotta start somewhere.

-nicole.

I guess I've realized it. I've realized that my life is going to change greatly. For the first time, I've looked past my own self and am finally realizing that I need to grow up. My mom is dieing. I found out today from my uncle that shes in critical condition with her cancer, and that she may not last the whole week. I guess I never really thought it would get this bad. I guess I thought she would somehow overcome this. A part of me knows that I need to prepare myself for the worst, but a part of me still believes she`ll pull through. I pray to God she does. Tomorrow I have to go and "say goodbye" to her. I don't know if I am going to be able to be strong and do this. I know the minute I walk into that hospital I am going to start crying. I am going to try my hardest to stay strong, for my mom. I know she is hurting and that makes me hurt so much. I know that we haven't been the closest in the past few months, and I wish we could have been closer. I wish there was just something I could have done. I wish I didn't piss her off so much in the past few months. I wish I never got kicked out of my house. I wish she would have let me move back when I wanted to. I wish she would have seen how much I cared about her, even though it may not have been easy to see. I wish I would have stopped being so stubborn and just appologize. I wish I could have told her I know shes going to pull through this. I wish I was strong. I wish I was strong. I wish I was strong. I wish I could say half of the things I want to say to her. I wish I could choke back my tears and tell her how I feel for once. Tell her how much I love her, and am grateful for all she has given me and taught me. Tell her that I`m sorry for all the trouble I've given her, and tell her that I should have been better. A better daughter. A better part of this family. A better impact on anything, something, going on in her life. I wish I could wake up tomorrow, and she would be healthy again. I wish I didn't take her for granted. My grandmom told me that I would regret things one day. And that day has come.

photoshoot in early may with Philly Creative Productions.

:]

I find out today that my mom has spine and brain cancer. 

I mean I guess this day could have been worse, but idk. It's been the worst day of this entire mother fucking year that we call 2007. The year that I told myself would be the best year of my life. The year that I would take control of my life and make good decisions and be responsible. The year I would learn to love myself for who i am, and not the girl I could have been. The year I would build a stronger relationship with my family. I guess this year isn't all that I had hoped it would be. 

Every year since I could remember I've made the same exact new years resolution and the same birthday wish as I blew out my candles on my cake. And every year since I could remember, that wish has never come true.

 I am totally embarrassed that I have failed miserably at a wish that I make every single year. Every single year I try to accomplish that goal and I only let myself down.

At school. I should be doing some work or something for English. My research paper is non-existant. I havent started it yet. The day right now blows. I had to wake up at 4:00 to catch the bus. Waited outside in the freezing cold for 45 minutes for the bus. I'm praying to god that this week goes alright. The weekend was alright. It better happen this week.

Not really looking forward to Thursday. Lets just say I'd rather jump off of a bridge.
Thursday is my Doctors appointment. Ever since I could remember I have been terrified of going to the doctors. The picking and poking of various body parts to see if they are functioning properly just makes me feel really uncomfortable. The fact that they document every thing about me kind of makes me realize everything is there in pen and ink, FOREVER. Forever I will be looked back upon whatever was written there in that annoying cold doctor's office. Ugh. I think I'm going to go crazy. When I was younger all I really remember about going to the doctors was the fact that if I was good I got a sticker with a smiley face on it. Well, now that I'm older what is there really to look forward to? Oh wow, I'm in good health, thank you Captain Fucking Obvious. I also remember going into the room with my mom and sister. And having the whole fucking world know my business. They just take your height and tell you how you messure up with a "normal child"`s height. They get your weight, and tell you how you messure up with a "normal child"`s weight. It's awful I tell you. AWFUL. Why do they have to compare you to other people. Like common now. You're healthy, you're good, whatever ; don't feel the need to tell my mother how I "measure up" to other people, I get that enough as it is. UASDHASKDHSAHSAD. Okay. I'm over with the ranting.

Lately all I've come to do is write. Lovely, I know. 

January 12, 2007
Crawled up like a ball
Sprawled on the floral sheets
Wanting to float away
Like the birds floating near my window
Flying for better days
Leaving this bitterness
For a better new place
Listening to the yawning
Yearning for a wink of sleep
Hearing mellow alternative
Glistening pupils feeling heavy
By the lids of eternal dreams.
   Goodnight.

February 17, 2007
"Critical"
A clear windowed life
So many critical faces, but still so alone
Entangled in the frusterations
What is reality?
Constant judgemental voices
Good or bad, no inbetween
They only see the facade
Stripped of what was really there
And to see what is real
To forget the judgments
To forget the tainted replies
To see what is left
Left with what was there all along
What was buried under, deep down
A clear windowed life
Left with the only judgmental face
Reflecting in the bathroom mirror.
